LanguageData.ARA_Basic_Start_Scenario.label: Arachne nest - Titan antenna
LanguageData.ARA_Basic_Start_Scenario.description: The Arachne Bug Empress - Taidan descends on the desolate Rimworld and prepares to begin building her own nest. Titan Antenna The Titan Antenna is the Arachne Bug's main force. It is composed of the most robust and adaptable species among the insect groups, and is responsible for maintaining the front line on the battlefield.This insect group has a well-balanced offense and defense, and is good at tactics that defeat the opponent head-on.
LanguageData.ARA_Basic_Start_Scenario.scenario.name: Arachne nest - Titan antenna
LanguageData.ARA_Basic_Start_Scenario.scenario.descri: The Arachne Bug Empress - Taidan descends on the desolate Rimworld and prepares to begin building her own nest. Titan Antenna The Titan Antenna is the Arachne Bug's main force. It is composed of the most robust and adaptable species among the insect groups, and is responsible for maintaining the front line on the battlefield.This insect group has a well-balanced offense and defense, and is good at tactics that defeat the opponent head-on.
LanguageData.ARA_Basic_Start_Scenario.scenario.summar: Arachne Bug Empress - Start the game with one Taitan species as the initial settler. There are 4 Arachne Bug egg sacs at the beginning.
The Empress species has arrived at the designated area.
Planetary environment inspection: habitable.
Biomass resources: Abundant.
Local native civilization: Threat level - low.
Neural network reconstruction complete. Welcome to join 'us'.

Initial directive:
Ensure the survival of the Empress species. This is the backbone.
Incubate the Arachne insect eggs and increase the population of the insect population here.
Assimilate the biomass of this area and stock up on materials that will ensure the survival of the insect population.
Rebuild the gene tree and make 'us' whole again.

For the survival of the hive.
